item.title: Equinix 开始调查卖空者 Hindenburg 的报告
item.description: 数据中心公司 Equinix 周一表示，其审计委员会已开始对做空机构 Hindenburg Research 在上周报告中提出的指控进行独立调查。【原文：Data center firm Equinix said on Monday its audit committee has commenced an independent investigation into the allegations made by short-seller Hindenburg Research in its report last week.】

item.title: 加拿大保险公司阳光人寿任命 Timothy Deacon 为首席财务官
item.description: 加拿大人寿保险公司永明金融（Sun Life Financial）周一任命业内资深人士蒂莫西-迪肯（Timothy Deacon）为首席财务官，自 4 月 8 日起生效。【原文：Canadian life insurer Sun Life Financial on Monday named industry veteran Timothy Deacon as its chief financial officer, effective April 8.】

item.title: 电动汽车初创企业菲斯科与大型汽车制造商的交易谈判结束
item.description: 电动汽车初创公司菲斯科周一表示，该公司与一家大型汽车制造商的潜在交易谈判已经破裂，导致其股价在收盘前暴跌超过 30%。【原文：Fisker's talks with a large automaker for a potential transaction has collapsed, the electric-vehicle startup said on Monday, sending its shares plunging more than 30% before the bell.】

item.title: VIEW 波音公司首席执行官将在管理层调整中下台
item.description: 波音公司首席执行官戴夫-卡尔霍恩（Dave Calhoun）将于年底前卸任，这是该公司因今年 1 月一架 737 MAX 飞机在空中发生面板爆炸而引发的大规模安全危机所导致的管理层大调整。【原文：Boeing Co CEO Dave Calhoun will step down by year-end, in a broad management shakeup brought on by the planemaker's sprawling safety crisis stemming from a January mid-air panel blowout on a 737 MAX plane.】

item.title: 艾伯维将收购兰多斯，扩大免疫相关疾病的产品线
item.description: 艾伯维（AbbVie）周一表示，将以不超过2.12亿美元的价格收购药物开发商兰多斯生物制药公司（Landos Biopharma），这家Humira生产商的目标是扩大其治疗免疫系统相关疾病的药物产品线。【原文：AbbVie said on Monday it would acquire drug developer Landos Biopharma for up to $212 million as the Humira-maker aims to expand its pipeline of medicines to treat immune system-related illnesses.】

item.title: 电动汽车制造商 Lucid 签订协议，向沙特 PIF 附属公司融资 10 亿美元
item.description: 豪华电动汽车制造商 Lucid 周一表示，该公司已与沙特阿拉伯公共投资基金（PIF）的一家附属公司签署了一项融资 10 亿美元的协议，从而使其股价在收盘前上涨了 20%。【原文：Luxury electric automaker Lucid said on Monday it had signed a deal to raise $1 billion in funding from an affiliate of Saudi Arabia's Public Investment Fund (PIF), sending its shares up 20% before the bell.】

item.title: 市场充满挑战，爱立信将在瑞典裁员 1200 人
item.description: 瑞典爱立信公司周一表示，作为今年早些时候宣布的成本削减计划的一部分，该公司将在瑞典裁员约1200人，理由是移动网络市场面临挑战，2024年的产量将下降。【原文：Sweden's Ericsson on Monday said it would lay off about 1,200 employees in Sweden as a part of costs cuts announced earlier this year, citing a challenging mobile networks market and lower volumes in 2024.】

item.title: 波音公司首席执行官戴夫-卡尔霍恩（Dave Calhoun）将在安全危机中的管理层调整中下台
item.description: 波音公司首席执行官戴夫-卡尔霍恩（Dave Calhoun）将于年底前卸任，这是该公司因今年 1 月一架 737 MAX 飞机在空中发生面板爆炸而引发的大规模安全危机所导致的管理层大调整。【原文：Boeing Co CEO Dave Calhoun will step down by year-end, in a broad management shakeup brought on by the planemaker's sprawling safety crisis stemming from a January mid-air panel blowout on a 737 MAX plane.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空局加强监管后，美国联合航空公司股价下跌
item.description: 在最近发生一系列安全事故后，美国联邦航空管理局（FAA）加大了对美联航的监管力度，美联航股价在周一盘前交易中下跌了约 5%。【原文：Shares of United Airlines fell about 5% in premarket trade on Monday after the U.S. Federal Aviation Administration's (FAA) move to increase its oversight of the carrier after a series of recent safety incidents.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，中国推动银行加快向私人开发商发放新贷款的审批速度
item.description: 知情人士称，中国监管机构正在推动银行加快向资金短缺的私人房地产开发商发放新贷款，以重振购房者的购房热情，但这有可能损害贷款机构的资产质量。【原文：Chinese regulators are pushing banks to speed up approvals of new loans to cash-starved private property developers, people with knowledge of the matter said, a bid to revive homebuyer sentiment that risks denting lenders' asset quality.】

item.title: 独家报道通过瞄准软件打破英伟达对人工智能控制的阴谋背后
item.description: Nvidia 通过生产人工智能芯片获得了 2.2 万亿美元的市值，这些芯片已成为新时代生成式人工智能开发者的命脉，这些开发者包括初创公司、微软、OpenAI 和谷歌母公司 Alphabet。【原文：Nvidia earned its $2.2 trillion market cap by producing artificial-intelligence chips that have become the lifeblood powering the new era of generative AI developers from startups to Microsoft , OpenAI and Google parent Alphabet .】

item.title: 诺和诺德将以最高 11 亿美元收购 Cardior 制药公司
item.description: 丹麦诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk）周一表示，已同意以不超过 10.3 亿欧元（11.1 亿美元）的价格收购 Cardior 制药公司，以加强其心血管产品线。【原文：Denmark's Novo Nordisk on Monday said it has agreed to buy Cardior Pharmaceuticals for up to 1.03 billion euros ($1.11 billion) to strengthen its cardiovascular pipeline.】

item.title: 您能在拍卖会上买到特朗普大厦吗？不会很快
item.description: 如果唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）不能在周一之前交纳保释金以支付 4.54 亿美元的民事欺诈判决，纽约州可能会开始查封他的房产，但特朗普大厦和其他珍贵的不动产可能还需要一年多的时间才能被查封。【原文：New York state could start seizing Donald Trump's properties if he doesn't post a bond by Monday to cover a $454 million civil fraud judgment, but it may be well over a year before Trump Tower and other prized real estate holdings are on the chopping block.】

item.title: 美联储有望降息，拜登前景看好
item.description: 随着总统竞选季的升温，美国联邦储备委员会（Federal Reserve）似乎有望降息，这可能会给乔-拜登总统（Joe Biden）带来鼓舞，因为民调显示美国人不喜欢他对经济的处理方式。【原文：The U.S. Federal Reserve looks on track to cut interest rates as the presidential campaign season heats up, potentially delivering President Joe Biden a boost as polls show Americans dislike his handling of the economy.】

item.title: 欧盟将在《数字市场法案》调查中针对苹果、谷歌和 Meta
item.description: 欧盟反垄断监管机构周一表示，苹果、Alphabet 旗下的谷歌和 Meta Platforms 将因可能违反《数字市场法》而接受调查，此举可能导致这些公司被处以巨额罚款。【原文：Apple , Alphabet's Google and Meta Platforms will be investigated for potential breaches of the Digital Markets Act, EU antitrust regulators said on Monday, a move that could lead to hefty fines for the companies.】

item.title: 美国的锂法律未能跟上快速发展的步伐
item.description: 美国各州的法规混乱不堪，阻碍了开发商的发展，也阻碍了打破中国对这一重要矿产领域控制的努力。【原文：Washington's drive to make the United States a major global lithium producer is being held back by a confusing mix of state regulations that are deterring developers and hampering efforts to break China's control of the critical minerals sector.】

item.title: Terraform Labs 民事欺诈案将在纽约开庭审理
item.description: Terraform Labs 及其创始人 Do Kwon 周一将在曼哈顿出庭受审，监管机构称他们在该公司的两种加密货币崩盘前向投资者撒谎，这两种加密货币在 2022 年扰乱了市场。【原文：Terraform Labs and its founder Do Kwon are set to face trial on Monday in Manhattan on a regulator's claim that they lied to investors before the collapse of two of the company's cryptocurrencies, which roiled markets in 2022.】

item.title: 早间竞价：本季度临近结束，日本和中国抑制经济下滑
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 假期缩短的一周伊始，期货市场有所缓和
item.description: 周一，在假期缩短的一周开始之际，美国股指期货走低，因为投资者期待本周晚些时候美联储官员的讲话和一个关键的通胀指标。【原文：U.S. stock index futures edged lower at the start of a holiday-shortened week on Monday, as investors look ahead to speeches from Federal Reserve officials and a key inflation marker later in the week.】

item.title: Northvolt 首席执行官表示，电动汽车发展有所下降，但趋势依然存在
item.description: Northvolt 首席执行官彼得-卡尔松（Peter Carlsson）周一在介绍这家瑞典电池制造商位于德国的新工厂时说，电动汽车的发展趋势有所下降，但汽车电气化的基本发展方向依然存在。【原文：There is some decline in the trend towards electric vehicles but the underlying development of electrifying automobiles remains in place, Northvolt CEO Peter Carlsson said when presenting the Swedish battery maker's new plant in Germany on Monday.】

item.title: 欧盟监察机构称汉莎航空与 ITA 航空公司的交易可能会损害竞争
item.description: 欧盟反垄断监管机构周一表示，汉莎航空竞购意大利竞争对手伊塔航空公司（ITA Airways）的少数股权可能会损害竞争并导致价格上涨，从而加大了对这家德国航空公司的压力，迫使其采取更有力的补救措施。【原文：Lufthansa's bid for a minority stake in Italian rival ITA Airways could harm competition and lead to higher prices, EU antitrust regulators said on Monday, ramping up pressure on the German carrier to come up with stronger remedies.】

item.title: 肖尔茨称赞诺斯沃尔特工厂是德国工业吸引力的标志
item.description: 德国总理奥拉夫-肖尔茨（Olaf Scholz）周一在为位于北部石勒苏益格-荷尔斯泰因州海德（Heide）的 Northvolt 电池工厂正式揭幕时表示，德国现在是、将来也仍将是一个强大的工业基地。【原文：Germany is and will remain a strong industrial location, Chancellor Olaf Scholz said on Monday as he formally opened construction at Northvolt's battery cell factory in Heide, in the northern state of Schleswig-Holstein.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚国家机构利用人工智能帮助农民利用欧盟资金
item.description: 罗马尼亚一家负责农村投资的国家机构周一表示，正在利用人工智能帮助农民申请欧盟资金，这在欧盟最不发达的数字经济体之一中尚属首次。【原文：A Romanian state agency for rural investments is using artificial intelligence to help farmers apply for European Union funds, it said on Monday, a first in one of the EU's least developed digital economies.】

item.title: 报道称，Talgo 的第一大股东正与 Stadler 商谈收购事宜
item.description: 据《经济学家报》周一援引未具名市场消息人士的话报道，Talgo 的第一大股东正在商谈将其持有的这家西班牙火车制造商 40% 的股份出售给瑞士竞争对手 Stadler Rail，以替代匈牙利 Ganz-Mavag 财团的投标报价。【原文：Talgo's top shareholder is in talks to sell its 40% stake in the Spanish train maker to Swiss rival Stadler Rail as an alternative to a tender offer from Hungary's Ganz-Mavag consortium, El Economista newspaper reported on Monday, citing unidentified market sources.】

item.title: 解说：日本加息。日元为何下跌？
item.description: 一周前，日本自 2007 年以来首次提高利率，此举标志着货币政策的历史性转变。【原文：A week ago Japan raised interest rates for the first time since 2007 in a move that marked a historic shift in monetary policy.】

item.title: 中国电动汽车制造商在曼谷车展上亮相，推出新车型
item.description: 在电动汽车强劲销售的推动下，中国汽车制造商将成为本周曼谷国际车展的焦点，这凸显了长期以来主导泰国汽车市场的日本汽车巨头面临的日益严峻的挑战。【原文：Boosted by strong electric vehicle sales, Chinese car makers will be in the spotlight at the Bangkok International Motor Show this week, underscoring the growing challenge to Japanese auto giants that have long dominated Thailand's vehicle market.】

item.title: Binance 将停止支持 Tron 区块链上的 USDC 稳定币
item.description: 加密货币交易所 Binance 周一表示，将停止支持通过 Tron 区块链进行 USDC 稳定币存取款。【原文：Cryptocurrency exchange Binance said on Monday it will end support for USDC stablecoin deposits and withdrawals via Tron blockchain.】

item.title: 未来三年日产汽车销量目标增长 100 万辆
item.description: 日产汽车公司周一表示，该公司的目标是在未来三年内全球汽车销量增加 100 万辆，并在 2027 年 3 月结束的财政年度前推出 30 款新车型。【原文：Nissan Motor said on Monday it would aim to sell 1 million more vehicles globally over the next three years, launching 30 new models by the fiscal year ending in March 2027.】

item.title: 可可反弹和市场动荡提升系统性对冲基金
item.description: 据业内人士和投资者称，创纪录的可可价格以及受通胀和地缘政治影响的市场，帮助采用系统化策略的对冲基金在第一季度跑赢了同行。【原文：Record cocoa prices and markets whipped around by inflation and geopolitics helped hedge funds using systematic strategies outperform their peers in the first quarter, according to industry players and investors.】

item.title: 西班牙银行大战，BBVA 缩小与桑坦德银行的差距
item.description: 自 2020 年底以来，BBVA 的股价上涨了三倍多，缩小了与桑坦德银行的估值差距，凸显了西班牙银行之间的命运分歧，但这种分歧可能是短暂的。【原文：BBVA's share price has more than trebled since late 2020, narrowing its valuation gap to Santander and highlighting a divergence in fortunes between the Spanish banks that may be short-lived.】
